title: Commutative and Associative Properties of Multiplication
text: Use the commutative and associative properties of multiplication to simplify the expression: $$\frac{1.2\times{10}^8}{9.6\times{10}^5}=\frac{1.2}{9.6} \frac{{10}^8}{{10}^5}$$

title: Quotient Rule of Exponents
text: Use the quotient rule of exponents to simplify the expression: $$\frac{1.2}{9.6} \frac{{10}^8}{{10}^5}=0.125\times{10}^3$$

title: Scientific Notation
text: Rewrite the expression in scientific notation: $$0.125\times{10}^3=1.25\times{10}^2$$
